properties.ingress:
Welcome to SWEDEN motherfuckers!
The shit has hit the fan, time to leave this circle.
properties.html:
An explosion occurred in a caf√© on Birger Jarlsgatan in central Stockholm. An unknown number of fatalities have been reported and a large number of people have been injured.

The event is categorized as a terrorist assault and the Security police handles the event as an ongoing attack. The security police awaits further attacks and advises the public to put themselves into safety. A number of gathering sites is being established in the immediate area.

Do you have medical experience? Rescue services needs your help.

The security police and police cooperate in the investigation with other countries' police organizations, Europol, Interpol and with other Swedish authorities.

If you have any tips about the attack, call the police at phone number 114 14
